amendment.description: To promote innovation and U.S. competitiveness by expressing the sense of the Senate urging the Senate Committee on Appropriations to make efforts to fund the Advanced Technology Program, which supports industry-led research and development of cutting-edge technologies with broad commercial potential and societal benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 238 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 80.

action.text: Amendment SA 238 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S2943-2944, S2947-2948) To promote innovation and U.S. competitiveness by expressing the sense of the Senate urging the Senate Committee on Appropriations to make efforts to fund the Advanced Technology Program, which supports industry-led research and development of cutting-edge technologies with broad commercial potential and societal benefits.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 238 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 80.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 238 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 80.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 238 proposed by Senator Levin.
